metadata.name: New Network Route Added
metadata.comment: Detects the addition of a new network route to a route table in AWS.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('ec2.amazonaws.com') AND lower(metadata.event_code) = lower('createroute'))

output.summary: Detects the addition of a new network route to a route table in AWS.

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. New VPC Creation requiring setup of a new route table 2. New subnets added requiring routing setup Reference: https://www.gorillastack.com/blog/real-time-events/important-aws-cloudtrail-security-events-tracking/
